author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

Fix compilation warnings:

```
 src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8577:19: warning: equality comparison with extraneous parentheses [-Wparentheses-equality]
  8577 |     if ((ampts[0] == ampts[1])) {
      |          ~~~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~~~~
src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8577:19: note: remove extraneous parentheses around the comparison to silence this warning
 8577 |     if ((ampts[0] == ampts[1])) {
      |         ~         ^          ~
src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8577:19: note: use '=' to turn this equality comparison into an assignment
 8577 |     if ((ampts[0] == ampts[1])) {
      |                   ^~
      |                   =
  src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8585:19: warning: equality comparison with extraneous parentheses [-Wparentheses-equality]
  8585 |     if ((ampts[1] == ampts[2])) {
      |          ~~~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~~~~
src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8585:19: note: remove extraneous parentheses around the comparison to silence this warning
 8585 |     if ((ampts[1] == ampts[2])) {
      |         ~         ^          ~
src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8585:19: note: use '=' to turn this equality comparison into an assignment
 8585 |     if ((ampts[1] == ampts[2])) {
      |                   ^~
      |                   =
  src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8593:19: warning: equality comparison with extraneous parentheses [-Wparentheses-equality]
  8593 |     if ((ampts[2] == ampts[3])) {
      |          ~~~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~~~~
src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8593:19: note: remove extraneous parentheses around the comparison to silence this warning
 8593 |     if ((ampts[2] == ampts[3])) {
      |         ~         ^          ~
src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8593:19: note: use '=' to turn this equality comparison into an assignment
 8593 |     if ((ampts[2] == ampts[3])) {
      |                   ^~
      |                   =
  src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8601:19: warning: equality comparison with extraneous parentheses [-Wparentheses-equality]
  8601 |     if ((ampts[3] == ampts[4])) {
      |          ~~~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~~~~
src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8601:19: note: remove extraneous parentheses around the comparison to silence this warning
 8601 |     if ((ampts[3] == ampts[4])) {
      |         ~         ^          ~
src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8601:19: note: use '=' to turn this equality comparison into an assignment
 8601 |     if ((ampts[3] == ampts[4])) {
      |                   ^~
      |                   =
  src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8609:19: warning: equality comparison with extraneous parentheses [-Wparentheses-equality]
  8609 |     if ((ampts[4] == ampts[5])) {
      |          ~~~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~~~~
src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8609:19: note: remove extraneous parentheses around the comparison to silence this warning
 8609 |     if ((ampts[4] == ampts[5])) {
      |         ~         ^          ~
src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8609:19: note: use '=' to turn this equality comparison into an assignment
 8609 |     if ((ampts[4] == ampts[5])) {
      |                   ^~
      |                   =
  src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8617:19: warning: equality comparison with extraneous parentheses [-Wparentheses-equality]
  8617 |     if ((ampts[5] == ampts[6])) {
      |          ~~~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~~~~
src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8617:19: note: remove extraneous parentheses around the comparison to silence this warning
 8617 |     if ((ampts[5] == ampts[6])) {
      |         ~         ^          ~
src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8617:19: note: use '=' to turn this equality comparison into an assignment
 8617 |     if ((ampts[5] == ampts[6])) {
      |                   ^~
      |                   =
  src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8625:19: warning: equality comparison with extraneous parentheses [-Wparentheses-equality]
  8625 |     if ((ampts[6] == ampts[7])) {
      |          ~~~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~~~~
src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8625:19: note: remove extraneous parentheses around the comparison to silence this warning
 8625 |     if ((ampts[6] == ampts[7])) {
      |         ~         ^          ~
src/DPGAnalysis/HcalTools/plugins/CMTRawAnalyzer.cc:8625:19: note: use '=' to turn this equality comparison into an assignment
 8625 |     if ((ampts[6] == ampts[7])) {
      |                   ^~
      |                   =
7 warnings generated.
```

#### PR validation:

Bot tests
title: Remove extraneous parentheses in CMTRawAnalyzer.cc
